title: Alternative Energy
description: Scientific principles governing the current and future approaches in solar photo-voltaics, fuel cells, biomass conversion, nuclear energy and wind power.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CHEM 1310 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or (CHEM 1211K Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and CHEM 1212K Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and PHYS 2211 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and PHYS 2212 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
